snippet: President Obama is looking for support as he presses for legislation that would give the administration new technological tools and broader authority in the battle against computer attacks.
abstract: President Obama is looking for support as he presses for legislation that would give the administration new technological tools and broader authority in the battle against computer attacks.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and NICOLE PERLROTH

headline.main: Obama Discusses Computer Security With Corporate Chiefs
